extension.name: EasyBlog Post Map
extension.author: StackIdeas
extension.copyright: Copyright 2009 - 2010 Stack Ideas. All rights reserved.
extension.description: Post map using Google Maps for your EasyBlog's component

param.name: routingtype
param.label: Routing Type
param.description: Choose the routing type when generate blog post link

param.name: menuitemid
param.label: Use Menu Item
param.description: Select menu item if you have choose to use 'menu item' as routing type

param.name: type
param.label: Filter Type
param.description: Choose the module filter type (Configure filter options below

param.name: count
param.label: Count
param.description: The maximum number of pins to display

param.name: showfeatureimage
param.label: Show Featured Image
param.description: Show or hide the post's featured image.

param.name: showauthor
param.label: Show Author of blog
param.description: If disabled, the author section will not be displayed.

param.name: showavatar
param.label: Show Blogger Avatar
param.description: Show or hide the post's blogger avatar.

param.name: showaddress
param.label: Show Address
param.description: Show or hide the location address.

param.name: showhits
param.label: Show Hits
param.description: Show or hide the hits.

param.name: showratings
param.label: Show Ratings
param.description: Show or hide the rating for the post

param.name: enableratings
param.label: Enable Ratings
param.description: Enable rating for the post

param.name: showcommentcount
param.label: Show Comment Count
param.description: Show or hide the post's comment total count in the module.

param.name: usefeatured
param.label: Only pickup featured posts [By Latest]
param.description: If enabled, module will only fetch featured blog entries

param.name: bloggerid
param.label: Blogger Id [By Blogger]
param.description: Only select blog posts from specific blogger.

param.name: showbloggeravatar
param.label: Show Blogger's Avatar [By Blogger]
param.description: Show or hide blogger's avatar in the module.

param.name: categoryid
param.label: Category Id [By Category]
param.description: Only select blog posts from specific category.

param.name: tagid
param.label: Tag Id [By Tag]
param.description: Only select blog posts from specific tag.

param.name: teamid
param.label: Team Id [By Team]
param.description: Only select blog posts from specific team.

param.name: mapwidth
param.label: Map Width
param.description: Width of the map (in pixels).

param.name: mapheight
param.label: Map Height
param.description: Height of the map (in pixels).

param.name: infowidth
param.label: Info Window Max Width
param.description: Maximum width of the info window (in pixels).

param.name: featuredimgwidth
param.label: Featured Image Max Width
param.description: Maximum width of the featured image (in pixels). This will only take effect if Show Featured Image is enabled.

param.name: featuredimgheight
param.label: Featured Image Max Height
param.description: Maximum height of the featured image (in pixels). This will only take effect if Show Featured Image is enabled.

param.name: mapui
param.label: Show Maps UI
param.description: Show Google Maps user interface on the map.

param.name: fitbounds
param.label: Fit Markers in Map Bounds
param.description: If enabled, Zoom Level will be disobeyed for map to fit all markers in map boundary.

param.name: zoom
param.label: Zoom Level
param.description: Set the default zoom level during map load.

param.name: language
param.label: Map Language
param.description: Set the map language used
